column2: Congratulations to the BioCirc Laboratory, all of our collaborators, graduate and undergraduate students on a job well done at the 58th Annual Conference of the American Society for Artificial Internal Organs (ASAIO) in San Francisco, CA, June 13-16, 2012. Michael Sciolino, graduate student, and Dr. Throckmorton delivered presentations entitled, "Controlled Pitch-Adjustment of Impeller Blades for an Intravascular Blood Pump" and "Intravascular Mechanical Cavopulmonary Assistance of 3-D Patient-Specific Fontan Configurations."
